00012 /**
00013  * default scaffolding-controller. extend it and use the hooks to costumize functionality
00014  * @package kata_scaffold
00015  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00016  */
00017 class ScaffoldController extends AppController {
00018 
00019     // hooks, overwrite them if you want
00020 
00021     function beforeDelete($id = null) {
00022         return true;
00023     }
00024 
00025     function beforeUpdate($id = null) {
00026         return true;
00027     }
00028 
00029     function beforeInsert($data = null) {
00030         return true;
00031     }
00032 
00033     // the scaffolder
00034 
00035     function beforeAction() {
00036         parent::beforeAction();
00037     }
00038     function beforeFilter() {
00039         parent::beforeFilter();
00040     }
00041     function afterFilter() {
00042         parent::afterFilter();
00043     }
00044 
00045     public $rowsPerPage = 50;
00046 
00047     private $MyModel = null;
00048     private function findModelToScaffold() {
00049         if (!is_array($this->uses) || (count($this->uses) == 0)) {
00050             throw new Exception('No Model to scaffold found');
00051         }
00052 
00053         $name = $this->uses[count($this->uses) - 1];
00054         $this->MyModel = getModel($name);
00055     }
00056 
00057     private function generateId() {
00058         
00059     }
00060 
00061     final function index() {
00062         $page = (int)is($this->params['url']['page'],0);
00063         $this->layout = '../../lib/views/layouts/scaffold';
00064         $this->findModelToScaffold();
00065         $this->set('schema', $this->MyModel->describe());
00066         $pages = ceil($this->MyModel->find('count')/$this->rowsPerPage);
00067         $this->set('pages', $pages);
00068         $this->set('page', min($pages,max(0,$page)));
00069         $this->set('data', $this->MyModel->find('all',array(
00070             'limit'=>$this->rowsPerPage,
00071             'page'=>$page
00072         )));
00073         $this->render('../../lib/views/scaffold/index');
00074     }
00075 
00076     final function delete($id = null) {
00077         if (!$this->beforeDelete($id)) {
00078             return;
00079         }
00080         $page = (int)is($this->params['url']['page'],0);
00081 
00082         if (isset ($id) && is_numeric($id)) {
00083             $this->findModelToScaffold();
00084             $this->MyModel->delete($id);
00085         }
00086         $this->redirect($this->params['controller'] . '/index/?page=' . $page);
00087     }
00088 
00089     final function update($id = null) {
00090         $this->layout = '../../lib/views/layouts/scaffold';
00091 
00092         if (isset ($this->params['form']['id']) && is_numeric($this->params['form']['id'])) {
00093             if ($this->beforeUpdate($id)) {
00094                 $this->findModelToScaffold();
00095                 $schema = $this->MyModel->describe();
00096                 $data = $this->params['form']['data'];
00097                 $id = $data[$schema['primary']];
00098                 unset ($data[$schema['primary']]);
00099                 if ($this->MyModel->update($id, $data)) {
00100                     $this->redirect('/' . $this->params['controller'] . '/index');
00101                     return;
00102                 }
00103             }
00104         }
00105 
00106         if (isset ($id) && is_numeric($id)) {
00107             $this->findModelToScaffold();
00108             $this->set('update', $id);
00109             $this->set('schema', $this->MyModel->describe());
00110             $data = $this->MyModel->read($id);
00111             $this->set('data', array_shift($data));
00112             $this->set('formData', isset ($this->params['form']['data']) ? $this->params['form']['data'] : array ());
00113             $this->render('../../lib/views/scaffold/record');
00114             return;
00115         }
00116 
00117         $this->redirect($this->params['controller'] . '/index/');
00118     }
00119 
00120     final function insert() {
00121         $this->layout = 'scaffold';
00122         $this->set('update', 0);
00123 
00124         if (isset ($this->params['form']['data']) && is_array($this->params['form']['data'])) {
00125             if ($this->beforeInsert($this->params['form']['data'])) {
00126                 $this->findModelToScaffold();
00127                 $schema = $this->MyModel->describe();
00128                 $data = $this->params['form']['data'];
00129                 $id = $data[$schema['primary']];
00130                 unset ($data[$schema['primary']]);
00131                 if ($this->MyModel->create($data)) {
00132                     $this->redirect('/' . $this->params['controller'] . '/index');
00133                     return;
00134                 }
00135             }
00136         }
00137 
00138         $this->findModelToScaffold();
00139         $this->set('schema', $this->MyModel->describe());
00140         $this->set('data', array ());
00141         $this->set('formData', isset ($this->params['form']['data']) ? $this->params['form']['data'] : array ());
00142         $this->render('../../lib/views/scaffold/record');
00143     }
00144 
00145 }
